title: Towards Building The Next Generation Computation Engine
abstract: In this poster, I first briefly introduce several system work in the Database Research Group at Southern University of Science and Technology, (i.e., DBGroup@SUSTech); I next present the key ideas of our on-going project, i.e., architecting the next generation computation engine, which is designed for data-intensive applications on heterogeneous computing environment.

journal.name: Proceedings of the ACM Turing Award Celebration Conference - China 2023
